text.author: Maureen F. McHugh
text.title: Mothers and Other Monsters
text.summary: A thirteen year old girl goes to mass with her father to take communion on a rainy day in March, then speculates who or what might be making two frightening noises she hears on her way back home as they pass through her school gym to get out of the rain.

head.s: The DT the AT0 DET det Beast NN beast NN1 NOUN root
